div.style: align-items: center; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(226, 226, 226), rgb(201, 214, 255)); color: rgb(171, 178, 191); display: flex; font-family: "Segoe WPC", "Segoe UI", sans-serif; font-size: 13px; inline-size: 671.797px; justify-content: center; padding-block: 30px; padding: 30px; padding-inline: 30px; scrollbar-color: rgba(78, 86, 102, 0.38) rgb(35, 39, 46); unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 671.797px; -webkit-locale: "en";

animation-duration: 0.3s; animation-name: bounceF; animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1); border-radius: 5px; border-end-end-radius: 5px; border-end-start-radius: 5px; border-start-end-radius: 5px; border-start-start-radius: 5px; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 20px 60px 0px; display: flex; min-inline-size: 100px; min-width: 100px; overflow: hidden; transition-duration: 0.2s; transition-property: opacity; unicode-bidi: isolate;

align-items: center; background-color: rgb(35, 39, 46); block-size: 35px; border-start-end-radius: 5px; border-start-start-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px; border-top-right-radius: 5px; cursor: default; display: flex; height: 35px; padding-block: 3px; padding: 3px 18px; padding-inline: 18px; unicode-bidi: isolate;

background-color: rgb(255, 95, 85); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 10px;

background-color: rgb(255, 189, 45); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 10px;

background-color: rgb(37, 201, 63); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 10px;

background-color: rgb(35, 39, 46); display: flex; min-block-size: 150px; min-height: 150px; min-inline-size: 250px; min-width: 250px; padding-block: 10px; padding: 10px 18px; padding-inline: 18px; unicode-bidi: isolate;
display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-inline-end: 15px; margin-right: 15px; padding-block-end: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; padding-inline-end: 5px; padding-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate;

div.style: background-color: rgb(35, 39, 46); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre; display: block; unicode-bidi: isolate;

span.style: color: #7f848e;

div.span: /* By element: Targeting all elements of a specific type */

span.style: color: #e06c75;
color: #d19a66;
color: #7f848e;

div.span: /* By class: Apply styles to elements that have a specific class. */

span.style: color: #d19a66;
color: #d19a66;
color: #d19a66;
color: #7f848e;

div.span: /* By ID: Target an element by its unique ID. */

span.style: color: #61afef;
color: #d19a66;
color: #7f848e;

div.span: /* By attribute selectors: Style elements based on their attributes */

span.style: color: #e06c75;
color: #c678dd;
color: #d19a66;
color: #98c379;
color: #c678dd;

div.style: display: flex; background-color: rgb(35, 39, 46); border-bottom-left-radius: 5px; border-bottom-right-radius: 5px; border-end-end-radius: 5px; border-end-start-radius: 5px; justify-content: center; padding-block: 8px 12px; padding: 8px 8px 12px; padding-inline: 8px; unicode-bidi: isolate;
